data.description: Welcome to your new 4-bedroom 3 bath quad-level home located in the desirable area of Sterling Heights. You will love the floor to ceiling windows and updated flooring in the living room! Large eat-in kitchen is open to the living space and all appliances are included. The lower level includes a cozy family room with a fireplace, 4th bedroom and bath. Having a partially finished basement is a bonus and features a laundry room with newer washer & dryer, plenty of finished storage space and a handy workshop. Step outside on the stamped concrete patio and enjoy the waterfall, pond and large play structure for the kids! Yard includes a shed for extra storage and is fully fenced. Attached 2 car garage is equipped with 220V for an electric car charger, Conveniently located near Fairfield Park playground, a variety of restaurants, grocery stores, retail shops, gyms, and golf courses!
